data.title: Candidates file for offices in Benton, Crawford, Sebastian and Washington counties
data.meta_description: The following candidates filed Wednesday for offices in cities in Benton, Crawford, Sebastian and Washington counties.
data.text:
The following candidates filed Wednesday for offices in cities in Benton, Crawford, Sebastian and Washington counties.

The filing period was the same for some education-related races, which are listed below.

Filing began at noon July 31 and ended at noon Wednesday.

Candidates will be on the ballot during the general election Nov. 5. Early voting begins Oct. 21. The deadline to register to vote in the general election is Oct. 6.

An * denotes an incumbent.
